title: [Fanart] Peeking Poppy Sticker

embed.description: Made a sticker of my favorite character from League, Poppy! Coming soon to Storenvy. Posting a picture of the actual sticker when it is printed from Sticker Mule. Mockup can be found here: https:...

body:
Made a simple (kinda minimalist) Poppy sticker. Wanted to make it look like she was peeking out from the bottom, similar to the Peeking Miku stickers. Normally I wouldn't post my fanart but I decided to make this the first. I also previously made a minimalist Star Guardian wallpaper using several of their weapons, if you wanna check that out. 
Any opinions or criticisms appriciated :)

(EDIT: I have remade the post with the printed versions being on my phone, and hid the original mockup post. Use this new one to see how the sticker looks IRL: https://dribbble.com/shots/3992720-Peeking-Poppy)

>
> Oh my gosh that's adorable 
> {{sticker:sg-lux}}

Thanks! <3
wouldn't that fit better on a pocket of something?

> [{quoted}](name=Friendly Ram,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=YRMthsAu,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-20T23:29:18.496+0000)
>
> wouldn't that fit better on a pocket of something?

I thought about that too honestly. Maybe I could make a shirt with it in a pocket. Thanks for the feedback! {{sticker:poppy-wink}}
